creator: kawhidc
title: Animatronic Falkor Dog
description: The project involves creating a custom animatronic dog resembling Falkor, a dragon-dog hybrid. The goal was to create an animatronic that walks and barks like a dog while maintaining dragon-like features to bring joy to a village and raise awareness for stray animals.
steps: Create a product design drawing based on client specifications, iterating on the design until the client's vision is captured.
Test and integrate motors to achieve various movements within the limited space of the animatronic's body, ensuring optimal motor usage through programming adjustments.
Engrave the texture of scales onto the animatronic's body using an electric iron with precision and care.
Stick the furs onto the animatronic, carefully applying them to the face while preserving details like dimples.
The Animatronic Falkor Dog is completed, exhibiting bravery, lively behavior, and kindness.
